definition: teaching by giving a discourse on some subject (typically to a class), censure severely or angrily
details:
noun
- teaching by giving a discourse on some subject (typically to a class)
= synonyms: lecturing
- a lengthy rebuke
= example: a lengthy rebuke
= synonyms: speech, talking to
- a speech that is open to the public
= example: a speech that is open to the public
= synonyms: talk, public lecture
verb
- censure severely or angrily
= synonyms: rag
- deliver a lecture or talk
= synonyms: talk
